org.apache.derbyTesting.perf.clients

Class SingleRecordUpdateClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.derbyTesting.perf.clients.SingleRecordUpdateClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Client

    public class SingleRecordUpdateClient
extends java.lang.Object
implements Client
    Client which updates a single record at a time on tables generated by SingleRecordFiller. Each time the client's doWork() method is called, it will pick one of the tables randomly, and update the text column of one random record in that table.
